name: CreateorupdateaMeasureReportfromCSVFormat
title: Create or update a MeasureReport from CSV Format
description:
Create or update a MeasureReport from the CSV Format. If a report already exists for the subject and reporter for the given time period, it is updated.
Otherwise, a new report is created. See [CSV Conversion](CSV_Conversion.html) for details.

parameter.name: input
parameter.documentation: The input of the request is a CSV file with labeled columns containing the data in the report.

parameter.name: map
parameter.documentation: Each parameter is a composite of column to measure mappings

parameter.name: period-end
parameter.documentation: The end of the reporting period.

parameter.name: period-start
parameter.documentation: The start of the reporting period.

parameter.name: reporter
parameter.documentation:
A reference or identifier of the reporter for the MeasureReport. If unspecified,
the server may determine the reporter based on business rules (e.g., based on the identity of the sender).

parameter.name: subject
parameter.documentation:
A reference or identifier of the subject for the MeasureReport. If unspecified,
the server may determine the subject based on business rules (e.g., based on the identity of the sender).

parameter.name: return
parameter.documentation: The result of the reporting operation
